title: Developing RAG-LLM Systems for Common Carbon AI
Summarizing Precedents using Large Language Models
description: Summarizing judicial precedents using deep learning/LLMs to help the judges figure out the case more easily.

title: Tight Bounding Boxes for Shape Decomposition
description: Conducting research on the decomposition of 3D shapes using tight bounding boxes under the supervision of Prof. Minhyuk Sung.

title: High-Frequency Trading Strategy using Order Book
description: Finding high-frequency trading strategy using deep learning with cryptocurrency order book data.

title: Long Term Video Prediction using VAE
description: Explored how to solve the frame collapse problem when generating long-term videos using VAE/GANs.
